jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in Iraq

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in Iraq

contentrichtext.text: {{update|date=November 2010}} {{Politics of Iraq}} This article lists '''political parties in Iraq'''. [[Iraq]] is a [[multi-party]] state. [[Political party|Political parties]] are commonly grouped by ideology/ethnic affiliation and by the group with which they were listed on the ballot of the [[Iraqi parliamentary election, January 2005|2005 Iraqi National Assembly election]]. ==Parliamentary alliances and parties== *State of Law coalition - current governing coalition; led by [[Nouri al-Maliki]] **[[Islamic Dawa Party]] (''Hizb al-Da'wa al-Islamiyya'') - led by Nouri al-Maliki **[[Supreme Islamic Iraqi Council]] (''al-Majlis al-alalith-thaura l-islamiyya fil-Iraq'') - led by [[Ammar al-Hakim]] **[[Sadrist Movement]] - led by [[Muqtada al-Sadr]] **[[Islamic Dawa Party - Iraq Organisation]] (''Hizb al-Da'wa al-Islami Tendeem al-Iraq'') - led by [[Kasim Muhammad Taqi al-Sahlani]] **[[Tribes of Iraq Coalition]] - led by [[Hamid al-Hais]] **[[Islamic Fayli Grouping in Iraq]] - led by [[Muqdad Al-Baghdadi]] *[[National Iraqi Alliance|Iraqi National Alliance]] *[[Democratic Patriotic Alliance of Kurdistan]] **[[Kurdistan Democratic Party of Iraq|Kurdistan Democratic Party]] (''Partiya Demokrat a Kurdistanê'') - led by [[Massoud Barzani]] **[[Patriotic Union of Kurdistan]] (''Yaketi Nishtimani Kurdistan'') - led by [[Jalal Talabani]] **[[Kurdistan Islamic Union]] (''Yekîtiya Islamiya Kurdistan'') - led by Ali Bapir **[[Movement for Change]] (''Bizutnaway Gorran'') - led by [[Nawshirwan Mustafa]] **[[Kurdistan Toilers’ Party]] (''Parti Zahmatkeshan Kurdistan'') **[[Kurdistan Communist Party]] (''Partiya Komunîst Kurdistan'') **[[Assyrian Patriotic Party]] *Goran List - led by Nashirwan Mustafa *Tawafuq Front (also called Iraqi Accord Front) *[[Iraqi List]] (''al-Qayimaal Iraqia'') **[[Iraqi National Accord]] - led by [[Iyad Allawi]] *[[The Iraqis]] - led by [[Ghazi al-Yawer]] *[[Iraqi Turkmen Front]] (''Irak Türkmen Cephesi)'') (same as [[Alliance of the Turkomen Front of Iraq]]?) *[[National Independent Cadres and Elites]] *[[People's Union (Iraq)|People's Union]] (''Ittihad Al Shaab'') **[[Iraqi Communist Party]] - led by [[Hamid Majid Mousa]] *[[Islamic Kurdish Society]] - led by [[Ali Abd-al Aziz]] *[[Islamic Labour Movement in Iraq]] *[[National Democratic Party (Iraq)|National Democratic Party]] (''Hizb al Dimuqratiyah al Wataniyah'') - led by [[Samir al-Sumaidai]] *[[National Rafidain List]] **[[Assyrian Democratic Movement]] (''Zowaa Dimuqrataya Aturaya'')- led by [[Yonadam Kanna]] *[[Reconciliation and Liberation Bloc]] *[[The Upholders of the Message]] (''Al-Risaliyun'') *[[Mithal al-Alusi List]] *[[Yazidi Movement for Reform and Progress]] ==Other parties== *[[Popular Unity Party (Iraq)|Popular Unity Party]] *[[Worker-Communist Party of Iraq]] *[[Leftist Worker-Communist Party of Iraq]] *[[Assembly of Independent Democrats|Alliance of Independent Democrats]] - led by [[Adnan Pachachi]] *[[National Democratic Party (Iraq)|National Democratic Party]] - [[Naseer al-Chaderchi]] *[[Green Party of Iraq]] *[http://www.iduus.com/ Iraqi Democratic Union] *[http://www.wifaq.com/ Iraqi National Accord ] *[[Constitutional Monarchy Movement]] - led by [[Sharif Ali Bin al-Hussein]] *[[Assyrian Patriotic Party]] - on the [[Democratic Patriotic Alliance of Kurdistan]] list *[[Assyria Liberation Party]] *[[Kurdistan Conservative Party]] *[[Turkmen People's Party]] *[[Iraqi Islamic Party]] - led by [[Mohsen Abdel Hamid]] *[http://www.alneshoor.com/ Al Neshoor Party ] ==Illegal parties== *[[Hizb ut-Tahrir]] *[[Ba'ath Party|Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party]] ([[Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Iraq Region|Regional Command]]{{·}} [[Ba'ath Party (Iraqi-led faction)|National Command]]) ==See also== *[[Politics of Iraq]] *[[List of political parties by country]] ==External links== *[http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/middle_east/4511450.stm List of political parties participating in December 2005 election] *[http://www.usip.org/pubs/specialreports/sr179.html Report on Iraq's New Political Map by the United States Institute of Peace] {{Iraq topics}} {{Iraqi political parties}} {{Asia topic|List of political parties in}} {{Use dmy dates|date=October 2010}} {{DEFAULTSORT:List Of Political Parties In Iraq}} [[Category:Lists of political parties|Iraq]] [[Category:Political parties in Iraq| ]] [[Category:Iraq-related lists]]
